text:
Morris Park Race Track (Bronx): North across the western edge of the famous race track, showing it after it was ordered closed by the State Banking Commission and dismantled. The concrete base which supported the grand stand is in the foreground. It measured 200 yards in length. On the extreme left is Bronxville Avenue and in the center, running from right to left, is Morris Park Avenue under construction.

Bronxdale Ave.

1913
title: Bronx: Morris Park Race Track.
